thread.title: Cyclist in critical condition after crash on Te Mata Peak near Hastings
thread.title_full: Cyclist in critical condition after crash on Te Mata Peak near Hastings

author: Damian George
title: Cyclist in critical condition after crash on Te Mata Peak near Hastings
text:
Cyclist in critical condition after crash on Te Mata Peak near Hastings DAMIAN GEORGE Last updated 20:04, February 7 2017 VIVIENNE HALDANE 
Te Mata Peak, where a man has suffered critical injuries after a cycling accident. 
A man is in a critical condition after falling down a cliff in a cycling accident near Hastings. 
A Wellington Free Ambulance spokesman said the incident happened at Te Mata Peak, south of the town, on Tuesday evening. 
The man, in his 40s, has been flown to Hawke's Bay Hospital. 
More soon
